title: Fabulous!
review: Received the item on schedule time and it's fine and I am happy.

title: PS4 Pro - Simply Awesome!
review:
Got the best deal on Flipkart compared to other online shopping websites.
Awesome Packaging. 
Timely Delivery within 2 days. 
Comes with Sony India 1 year Warranty - Warranty Card inside the box.
Its a genuine product not imported. 
Sony launched PS4 pro in India in the month of February this year, and I've got the February 2018 manufactured model itself.
Dont re-think about warranty issues, just go for it guys.

title: Highly recommended
review: Amazing product! Those of you who are buying this must already know that PS4pro is the best gaming console available right now. The Xbox one X is almost as good as this. If you're thinking of buying this, go for it. Services of Flipkart was amazing. Got the product in the estimated time.

title: Great product
review: got it, awesome product, speedy delivery.. waiting to see the 4k graphics display
